newsitem.title: USA: MVSI enters computing pact with Newport.
newsitem.headline: MVSI enters computing pact with Newport.

text.p: MVSI Inc said on Tuesday it has entered an agreement to provide computer services for Newport News Shipbuilding Inc.
MVSI said in a statement that its program with Newport News could add $2 million per month to MVSI's revenues, when two computer related integration centers are fully operational.
Under the arrangment for a computer service center, MVSI will deliver hardware and software and related services to support Newport News's computing operations.
Newport News said in the MVSI statement that the arrangement will eliminate delays that computer users endure by waiting for quotes from suppliers and waiting for shipment arrivals.
The service center is expected to be operational later this month, MVSI said.
